summary: This node handles WhatsApp events via webhooks.

parameters.name: whatsappnotice
parameters.description: A notice about the limitation of using just one WhatsApp trigger for each Facebook App.

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: Select the type of WhatsApp events to trigger on.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the WhatsApp trigger.

options.name: messagestatusupdates
options.description: Set the trigger to execute only on selected message status updates.
